content:
In the context of conservation biology, which of the following best describes the concept of "keystone species"?
A. Species that have a disproportionately large effect on their environment relative to their abundance.
B. Species that are most likely to become extinct in the near future.
C. Species that are introduced to a new environment and become dominant.
D. Species that have a minimal impact on their environment.
A. Species that have a disproportionately large effect on their environment relative to their abundance.
